Ni som får "Problem connecting to tracker - timeout exceeded" kör BitTornado och har fel portinställningar.

Har ni en router  måste ni dirrigera de fyra inkommande portarna som TPB använder. I BitTornado ska ni ha alla portar öppna, alltså ingen begränsning.

Har ni bara ett ADSL-modem? Låt alla portar vara öppna.

Därefter kan ni oxå börja seeda på riktigt, vilket ni inte gör idag.

Sälvklart förutsätter jag att ni har en mjukvarubaserad brandvägg.
... eller byt klient.

Great Quality. Use Winrar to extract the avi from the cd1 & cd2 folders after download.

If you get no audio.... download the AC3 audio filter from

http://www.afterdawn.com/software/video_software/codecs_and_filters/ac3filter.cfm
;-)
Thanks, Marcus!

Thanks, Marcus!

You've been a great help. You fixed the problem for a lot of Divx movies.  I suppose the the experts consider this "common knowledge", but if you are new to the game, then this information is very valuable. For those interested in changing AC3 settings to obtain higher volume, please check below:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
how to increase AC3 volume 

Windows 
Control Panel 
AC3 

1 Open AC3 filter, at bottom uncheck "Normalize" box and raise the volume slider to max. 
uncheck 3 "BSI lock" boxes and raise sliders to max. 

2 Select "Mixer" tab at top, uncheck ALL boxes. 

3 Select "Equalizer" tab at top. check mark "Equalizer on" box and slide all volume slides to the max. 

4 Select "System" tab at top 
uncheck "auto load movie configuration files" 
uncheck "Use WAVEFORMATEXTENSIBLE" 
check mark "Wave out" button (it's below "Direct Sound") 

5 Click "OK" at bottom to save these new settings

-------------------------------------------------------------------
